info.name: Medicine Delivery API Tests
info.description: Comprehensive test collection for Medicine Delivery API endpoints including authentication, setup, orders, products, role permissions, user management, medical stores, customer support, managers, customers, and customer addresses. Updated to match latest API changes with mobile number-based authentication.
